experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Resolution Life
workDescription: Deployed serverless functions for the document reverse engineering AI model in **AWS Lambda** with data being stored and queried via a **DynamoDB** database on a training dataset of **75,000+** diverse documents.
Constructed and deployed CI/CD pipelines, through **CircleCI** for the AI model, enhancing system reliability by **40%** and reducing release downtime by **25%**.
Developed a user interface using **React** by integrating the AI model's technologies in **Docker**, enabling users to query and generate documents with tags and filters in less than **2 seconds**.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Resolution Life
workDescription: Spearheaded the development of a document reverse engineering AI model using NLP techniques in **spaCy** and **NLTK**, resulting in a **75%** reduction in document processing time and saving **$1,000,000+** in acquisition costs.

Trained the AI model using ML libraries **PyTorch** and **TensorFlow** for matrices and tensors to derive relations between values, the model was also sold as a microservice resulting in **$10,000+** of additional revenue.

Launched a comprehensive test suite utilizing **Pytest** to perform unit, integration and system testing to automate model evaluation and utilize testing to enhance document regeneration accuracy by over **90%**.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Canadian Automobile Association
workDescription: Created a conversational AI chatbot using **Google Dialogflow** to answer questions from tow facilities and CAA employees, which reduced the time to read manuals by over **50%**.

Designed and maintained informative webpages using **Javascript** and **React** to provide CAA employees and tow facility personnel across **100+ teams** with up-to-date information on Gen 2 features and updates.
Established a centralized knowledge base using **Wiki.js** to manage **1000+** software manuals, streamlining access through tags and search filters while providing responses within **1 second**.

experiences.title: Data Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Canadian Automobile Association
workDescription: Engineered dynamic dispatch algorithms leveraging GPS Data (**Reverse Geocoding API**) and predictive analysis (**Gen 2**) in **Python** and utilizing **Twilio** for real-time dispatching, thereby reducing service times by over **25%**.

Integrated the algorithms into production using **APIs**, **Python**, and **Power BI**, which facilitated real-time dispatching based on proximity and predicated demand to improve customer satisfaction rates by **40%**.

Automated ETL processes and optimized data workflows via **Apache Airflow**, which resulted in a **15%** reduction in latency and significantly improved the reliability of data delivery for real-time analytics.
